evidence.text: one of its more common usages in some parts of the English-speaking world. Some English-speaking countries censor it on television and radio. evidence.title: Sweetheart
evidence.text: Sweetheart is a term of endearment often applied to a loved one, or a person who demonstrates a significant amount of kindness.
